Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I am creating a contest for any rocket in history or you can design your own. the mods allowed are:

KPSI

KW rocketry

B9 aerospace

if you would like to post a download link to the craft you are more than welcome to BUT PLEASE POST A PICTURE of the craft and a list of the mods it uses.

Here is my Atlas V rocket

[ IMG ]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bw6JnfygihuPVEtKbkhNOF8wdzA/edit?usp=sharing[ /IMG ]

KerbCO

P.S.

Here are some kickstarting ideas

Atlas V rocket

saturn V

Genesis

Mercury

Edited June 7, 2014 by KerbCo
youhave forgot to set the sharing settings right. or put the picture of it in imugur or something similar

Also, if this will be a competiton then it probably belongs in the forum below. There are some rules listed in there that explain how to set up a challenge like this. Plus I think you would get more interest in the challenge.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/26-Challenges
ok i did not see the challenges thread and i thought the space craft exchange was the most appropriate location for it. sorry my bad.
